text: Predpishi dlya nas dobro v etom mire i v Posledney zhizni, ibo my vozvrashchayemsya k Tebe (kayemsya pered Toboy). On skazal: Â«YA porazhayu Svoim nakazaniyem, kogo pozhelayu, a Moya milost' ob"yemlet vsyakuyu veshch'. YA predpishu yeye dlya tekh, kotoryye budut bogoboyaznenny, stanut vyplachivat' zakyat i uveruyut v Nashi znameniya
